name: GETBATS O2O
author: GETBATS

sections.description:
GETBATS is a rebate platform for its members to gain instant cash rebates when shopping online and offline. Each time a transaction is made via GETBATS, the shopper gets a percentage of that amount back as a rebate. The rebates earned can be withdrawn as cash via registered e-Wallets.

On GETBATS, there are no limits and no expiry to the rebates earned.

GETBATS also provides its members access to a huge range of exclusive offers and wonderful surprises, with Touch-to-Surprise and periodical Lucky Draw after every approved transaction as well as discounts and coupons, from thousands of local and internationally renowned brands in fashion, food, services and plenty others – all on one platform.

All you have to do is sign up to GETBATS, get shopping and get rebates!
sections.installation:
1. Make sure that you already have WooCommerce plugin installed and activated.
  2. From your WordPress admin dashboard, go to menu ‘Plugins’ and ‘Add New’.
  3. Key in ‘GETBATS’ in the ‘Search Plugins’ field and press enter.
  4. It will display the plugin and press intall.
  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  6. Go to GETBATS O2O menu, fill in your merchant id and cashback percentage.
sections.faq:
Do I need to sign up with GETBATS in order to use this plugin?

Yes, we require info such as merchant id, that is only available after you sign up with GETBATS.

How to GET Rebates?

  1. Sign up as a GETBATS member for FREE.
  2. Browse through our list of partner stores and click on your desired one.
  3. You will then redirected to the store’s website/mobile app, just shop and check out from your selected store as usual.
  4. Your rebate will be tracked by us automatically!
  5. Accumulate your cash rebates and withdraw them to your registered e-Wallet!

Can I use this plugin without using WooCommerce?

No.

Why Choose GETBATS?

  • GETBATS is FREE.

  • GETBATS is the only platform where rebates earned have NO LIMITS and NO EXPIRY.

  • GETBATS has the FASTEST REBATE VALIDATION PERIOD, with INSTANT REBATES and the latest, within 30 days.

  • GETBATS provides the FASTEST CASH WITHDRAWAL via e-Wallet transfer.

  • GETBATS rewards referrals with even more earnings.

  • GETBATS is the only platform in Malaysia that rewards you for shopping online and in-stores.

Love GETBATS?

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GETBATS

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/getbats/

Install and start earning now!

What if I have some other question related to GETBATS?

Please open a ticket by log in to GETBATS Dashboard and look for menu support.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • initial version for Woocommerce 6.3 full compatibility
  • supports WordPress 5.9.x and above
  • supports Woocommerce 6.3.x and above
